send.description: Defines if to send a notification through this channel.

condition.description: Defines when to send a notification through this channel.

template.description: The template if the channel supports it.

type.description: The error type, usually a link.

statusCode.description: Status code of the http response.

token.description: The token for the integrated app.

fullName.description: The full name of the user.

preferredLanguage.description: The preferred language of the user.

subscribe.description: A list of topics to create.

unsubscribe.description: A list of topics to unsubscribe from.

apiKey.description: The unique api key for the user.

fullName.description: The full name of the user.

preferredLanguage.description: The preferred language of the user.

created.description: The date time (ISO 8601) when the user has been created.

lastUpdate.description: The date time (ISO 8601) when the user has been updated.

lastNotification.description: The date time (ISO 8601) when the user has been received the last notification.

requiresWhitelistedTopics.description: True when only whitelisted topic are allowed.

deviceIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the device.

lastWakeup.description: The last time the device was woken up.

lastUpdate.description: The date time (ISO 8601) when the template has been updated.

subject.description: The required subject with one entry per language.

body.description: The optional body with one entry per language.

confirmText.description: The optional confirm text with one entry per language.

imageSmall.description: The optional small image with one entry per language.

imageLarge.description: The optional large image with one entry per language.

linkUrl.description: The optional link url with one entry per language.

linkText.description: The optional link name with one entry per language.

email.description: The email of the user. Unique value.

firstDelivered.description: The information when the notifcation was marked as deliverd.

firstSeen.description: The information when the notifcation was marked as seen.

firstConfirmed.description: The information when the notifcation was marked as confirmed.

status.description: The status per token or configuration.

firstDelivered.description: The first time the notification has been marked as delivered for this channel.

firstSeen.description: The first time the notification has been marked as seen for this channel.

firstConfirmed.description: The first time the notification has been marked as confirmed for this channel.

firstDelivered.description: The first time the notification has been marked as delivered for this identifier.

firstSeen.description: The first time the notification has been marked as seen for this identifier.

firstConfirmed.description: The first time the notification has been marked as confirmed for this identifier.

channel.description: The channel over which the notification was marked as seen or confirmed.

subject.description: The subject of the notification in the language of the user.

silent.description: True when the notification is silent.

created.description: The timestamp when the notification has been created.

updated.description: The timestamp when the notification has been updated.

imageSmall.description: The optional link to the small image.

imageLarge.description: The optional link to the large image.

trackDeliveredUrl.description: The tracking url that needs to be invoked to mark the notification as delivered.

confirmText.description: The text for the confirm button.

correlationId.description: The correlation ID, that can be used to query notifications.

data.description: Optional data, usually a json object.

isSeen.description: True when the notification has been seen at least once.

isConfirmed.description: True when the notification has been confirmed at least once.

confirmed.description: The id of the noitifications to mark as confirmed.

seen.description: The id of the noitifications to mark as seen.
